column4: Tag flexible<ref group="featurenotes" name="flextag">Flexible tagging is the ability to read or write custom tags  apart from the default ones like title  album and date. Users can use custom tags to provide additional information to media files. Custom tags work via ID3v2.4 (via the TXXX tag field)  Vorbis comments and APEv2.</ref>

column3: <ref group="featurenotes" name="aimptag">Through use of the Advanced Tag Editor.</ref>
<ref group="featurenotes" name="Paid version only">Paid version only</ref>
